summary: This mod adds a new player home in Skyrim. Buyable, decorable and with also RPG elements included.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/t94iid68u93u5py/manny.png?dl=1&token_hash=AAEIEPhxKj2lO3-1wXsAl9Vypgf6k4TsVc3sxuYWQTLS1Q[/img]

[img]http://s23.postimg.org/x9pg5jjq3/titolo.jpg[/img]

USE THE FORUMS SECTION FOR THE COMMENTS[/center]

[color=cyan]* OVERVIEW *[/color]
This mod adds a new player home in Skyrim. Buyable, decorable and with also RPG elements included.

[center][youtube]z6eI5aPd0GU[/youtube][youtube]jiZrpW1n3bE[/youtube][/center]

[color=cyan]* DESCRIPTION *[/color]
I'm a fan of full immersion gameplay so I've made this Playerhome RPG oriented mod within a brand new location.
The location is not instantly available, you are supposed to buy it first then add all the furnitures you need later.
[center][img]http://s9.postimg.org/g578hjyfj/2013_05_11_00034.jpg[/img][/center]

[color=cyan]* FEATURES *[/color]
Silverfish grotto
- Smithing area
- Relax area
- Shrine area
- Shooting Range
- Greenhouse Area *
- Servant quarters

* The Greenhouse Scripts has nothing to do with Hearthfire harvest system.
The harvest system used in this Greenhouse is quite different and totally custom.
THIS MEANS THAT YOU DON'T NEED ANY DLC AND THERE IS NO COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT!

Silverfish home
- Living room
- Library
- Master bedroom
- Bedroom
- Alchemy desk
- Enchantement desk
- Mannequins and weapon plaques
- Armory Room
- Storage Basement

[img]http://s15.postimg.org/h9kpgfw6z/2013_05_11_00022.jpg[/img]

Everything is buyable and prices depends on your character Level and related Perks of your Speechcraft skills.
ALL THE CHESTS ARE SAFE CONTAINERS EXCEPT FOR THE BARRELS OUTSIDE THE HOUSE!

[color=cyan]* RPG ELEMENTS *[/color]
All candles, lanterns, braziers and fireplace can be lit on or off. When a light is on, it will turn automatically off after 8 ingame hours.
There are two "Lazy buttons" for "Lazy users" on the right side of the home stairs.
These buttons toggles the interior and exterior lights ON permanently or not.
To avoid glitches, my best recommendation is to enable these buttons (if you want) only if you've bought all the furnitures and when all the lights are off.

Take care of your place and clean up your home. When you are missing for a long time you'll have to do it all over again:
- After 3 or more days absence, you'll find dirt on the floor.
- After 28 or more days absence, you'll find spiderwebs to remove too (Which keeps growing if you not clean up).
- After longer periods you'll find more stuff which I'm not going to explain to not spoil anything away.

[color=cyan]* HIRE THE HOUSEMAID AND GUARDS *[/color]
If you're too busy slaying dragons and collecting butterflies you can now hire people to clean and protect your house.
Just furnish the servant quarter and a quest will starts.

The NPCs
- Greir: She's the housemaid and will take care of your home. She cleans up your home everyday from 9am to 12am.
Also she can buy food supplies for you at Solitude. Perfect for Realistic Needs and Diseases mod!
- Bormir: He's a Guard available for night duty shift. He patrols the location from 8pm to 8am.
- Rigmad: He's a Guard avaialble for daytime shifts. He patrols the location from 8am to 8pm.

[img]http://s15.postimg.org/g60l4hbjv/2013_05_11_00014.jpg[/img]

[color=cyan]* HOW TO START? *[/color]
Install the mod and Play. A courier will bring you a letter, that's it!

[color=cyan]* UNINSTALL PROCEDURE *[/color]
- GET BACK ALL YOUR ITMES FROM CHESTS, MANNEQUINES, RACKS OR YOU'LL LOST THEM!
- GO IN A VANILLA INTERIOR, LIKE BREEZEHOME OR DRAGONSREACH
- WAIT FOR AT LEAST 5 DAYS
- MAKE A NEW SAVEGAME
- UNINSTALL THIS MOD
- RELOAD SKYRIM AND RELOAD THE SAVEGAME YOU MADE ABOVE
- MAKE A NEW SAVEGAME
- CONTINUE YOUR JOURNEY IN SKYRIM.

[img]http://s24.postimg.org/mt9c37kpx/2013_05_11_00017.jpg[/img]

[color=cyan]* KNOWN ISSUES *[/color]
The master bedroom does not show the "Well rested" message, however it works. Just see your "active effects" in the magic section.
Cleaning mod: The current version is safe if you do not stand few harmless dirty edits ((and those are just ITMs) try to clean it yourselves but do not complain if everything breaks up. I don't want to clean the mod myself.
Load order: highly recommended to put at the very top of the list.

[color=cyan]* CREDITS *[/color]
A big "Thank you" to my friend MurderWrath who helped me making this mod by giving me ideas, cluttering, translating, and testing everything.
To Tamira, for teaching me how furniture markers works.
To Artisanix for his painting and frames mod resources (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17423)
To Boris II for French translation.
Thanks to all the friends of the Official Bethesda's Forums, a very precious resource for who needs help modding.

[color=cyan]* FACEBOOK *[/color]
I'm on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods
Join me!
author: MannyGT

files.name: Silverfish
files.changelogHtml:
Bug fix for buying shrine
Map marker "Silverfish grotto" changed to "Silverfish Grotto"
Map marker "Silverfish house" changed to "Silverfish House"

files.name: Silverfish
files.changelogHtml: Plaques and displays in the armory now works.

files.name: Silverfish
files.changelogHtml:
New features:

- Servant quarters
- Greenhouse
- Hireling housemaid and she can go to Solitude to buy food supplies. PERFECT FOR WHO HAVE REALISTIC NEEDS AND DISEASES!
- Hireling daytime guard
- Hireling nighttime guard
- Decorate your home with painting and frames
- And you don't need any new clean savegame to update!
- Toggle Buttons for lazy users (switch the lighting features to a one touch control, setting light sources
to permanent states ON or OFF without previous custom timing and single interaction)

Bug fixed:

- Armory
- Weapon Plaques and shield

files.name: Silverfish
files.changelogHtml:
The voices for Greir, Bormir and Rigmad are modified.
Added dialogue options to Greir, Bormir and Rigmad in case you don't have enough money
Added a lantern near the stairs of the Servant Quarters
